listitem.para: The COUNTER variable is used in most cases to guarantee a unique global identifier for options declared using the PARAM_*() macros. However, not all compilers have this supportmost notably, gcc < 4.3. In that case, the LINE macro is used as an attempt to get a unique global identifier, but collisions are still possible, and they produce bizarre error messages. See https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/issues/100 for more information.
